snippet: A Place for Mom, a company that helps with placement in assisted living centers, now offers an online guide to the information each state provides.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column; A Place for Mom Inc, commercial housing referral service for older adults, now offers online, state-by-state guide to obtaining records on assisted living communities; directory ranks all 50 states and District of Columbia based on ease with which consumers can gain access to inspection reports and other documents.
lead_paragraph: A Place for Mom, a company that helps with placement in assisted living centers, now offers an online guide to the information each state provides.

headline.main: Searching for Quality in Assisted Living Care
headline.print_headline: Searching for Quality in Assisted Living Care
